ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment to the position of special adviser to the Prime Minister of the Honourable JOHN MANLEY of Ottawa, Ontario, as Chairperson of the Independent Panel on Canada's Future Role in Afghanistan, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on March 31, 2008.
